payload.name: landauer-s-principle
payload.title: Landauer’s principle: erasure costs energy, so “free compute” is fake
payload.apm2_mapping: treat **token budgets**, **tool budgets**, and **artifact bytes** not as “product limits” but as **thermodynamic proxies**: every extra tool call and every extra token is irrecoverable physical work somewhere. APM2 already encodes this as session budgets (`apm2_core::budget`) and ContextPack budgets (CAC). The missing step is to express *energy/cost* as a first‑class budget dimension and bind it to receipts (so “we spent X” is auditable, not narrative).
